Articles.Content: Hello, my fellow Kerbonauts, Astronauts, Cosmonauts, and Dreadnoughts! Despite not even being able to make a ship able to make it out of orbit, I absolutely LOVE this game, and I have decided to sign up to the forums as a result! I hope to write some good fanfics and maybe actually FINALLY make it to deep spaaaaaaaaaaace!

Not to worry Nymus!! In the next update they are implementing new, more detailed tutorials, as well as pre-designed ships!! (dont ask me or anyone about the release date as this is 'illegal' to the forums)

But nonetheless, WELCOME TO KSP!!!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
